author: Amanda Jackson, CNN
title: Here's how hospitals are celebrating when a Covid-19 patient is released
description: For over two weeks, a woman in Texas laid in a hospital bed fighting for her life after testing positive for the coronavirus.
content:
(CNN)For over two weeks, a woman in Texas laid in a hospital bed fighting for her life after testing positive for the coronavirus. 
She spent 10 days on a ventilator to help her breathe. But she fought the virus and was released from the Austin hospital afte… [+1773 chars]
